sentences: Ta langes mängust välja peale esimest vastuolu.
Kas sa veel oled mängust väljas?
context: In Estonian, 'mängust' is an elative form of 'mäng', meaning 'game'. It indicates movement or position away from a game. This form shows that something has come out of the game context - either physically left the playing area, been eliminated/removed from participation in a game, or no longer belongs within the framework of a particular game or situation.
